name: AIA_UTIL_GetStartAndEndDateOfYear
description: Rule to get the start and end date of a year
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!year: year(today()) - ri!yearsAgo,
  local!endOfYear: if(
    ri!tillPresentDay,
    today(),
    date(local!year, 12, 31)
  ),
  {
    userdatetime(local!year, 1, 1, 0, 1),
    userdatetime(
      local!year,
      month(local!endOfYear),
      day(local!endOfYear),
      23,
      59
    )
  }
)
